subcategory.name: Pricing Sections
subcategory.description: Pricing section examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS pricing section examples to explain your pricing model to potential customers. These examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

components.name: Two tiers with emphasized tier
components.iframeHtml:
Pricing

Choose the right plan for you

Choose an affordable plan that’s packed with the best features for engaging your audience, creating customer loyalty, and driving sales.

Hobby

$29 /month

The perfect plan if you're just getting started with our product.

  • 25 products
  • Up to 10,000 subscribers
  • Advanced analytics
  • 24-hour support response time
Get started today

Enterprise

$99 /month

Dedicated support and infrastructure for your company.

  • Unlimited products
  • Unlimited subscribers
  • Advanced analytics
  • Dedicated support representative
  • Marketing automations
  • Custom integrations
Get started today

components.name: Three tiers with logos and feature comparison

snippet.name: html
snippet.code:
Pricing that grows with your team size

Choose an affordable plan that’s packed with the best features for engaging your audience, creating customer loyalty, and driving sales.

Starter plan

Everything you need to get started.

$19

USD

per month

Start a free trial

Start selling with:

  • Custom domains
  • Edge content delivery
  • Advanced analytics
  • Not included: Quarterly workshops
  • Not included: Single sign-on (SSO)
  • Not included: Priority phone support

Growth plan

All the extras for your growing team.

$49

USD

per month

Start a free trial

Start selling with:

  • Custom domains
  • Edge content delivery
  • Advanced analytics
  • Quarterly workshops
  • Not included: Single sign-on (SSO)
  • Not included: Priority phone support

Scale plan

Added flexibility at scale.

$99

USD

per month

Start a free trial

Start selling with:

  • Custom domains
  • Edge content delivery
  • Advanced analytics
  • Quarterly workshops
  • Single sign-on (SSO)
  • Priority phone support
Pricing plan comparison
Starter plan
Growth plan
Scale plan
Get started Get started Get started
Features
Edge content delivery Included in Starter Included in Growth Included in Scale
Custom domains Starter includes: 1 Growth includes: 3 Scale includes: Unlimited
Team members Starter includes: 3 Growth includes: 20 Scale includes: Unlimited
Single sign-on (SSO) Not included in Starter Not included in Growth Included in Scale

components.name: Three tiers with dividers
components.iframeHtml:
Pricing

Pricing that grows with you

Choose an affordable plan that’s packed with the best features for engaging your audience, creating customer loyalty, and driving sales.

Basic

$19 /month

$15 per month if paid annually

Buy plan

Everything necessary to get started.

  • 5 products
  • Up to 1,000 subscribers
  • Basic analytics
  • 48-hour support response time

Essential

$49 /month

$39 per month if paid annually

Buy plan

Everything in Basic, plus essential tools for growing your business.

  • 25 products
  • Up to 10,000 subscribers
  • Advanced analytics
  • 24-hour support response time
  • Marketing automations

Growth

$99 /month

$79 per month if paid annually

Buy plan

Everything in Essential, plus collaboration tools and deeper insights.

  • Unlimited products
  • Unlimited subscribers
  • Advanced analytics
  • 1-hour, dedicated support response time
  • Marketing automations
  • Custom reporting tools

Pricing that grows with you

Choose an affordable plan that’s packed with the best features for engaging your audience, creating customer loyalty, and driving sales.

Starter

$19 /month

Buy plan
    • Edge content delivery
    • Custom domains (1)
    • Team members (3)
    • Advanced analytics
    • 24/7 online support

Growth

$49 /month

Buy plan
    • Edge content delivery
    • Custom domains (3)
    • Team members (20)

    • Basic reports
    • 24/7 online support
    • Quarterly workshops

Scale

    • Basic reports
